citations.narrative:
This facility is currently conducting regulated activity without a USDA license. Five (5) disposition forms confirmed the
transfer of a total of 24 dogs and/or puppies from this facility/business to a USDA Licensed B Dealer. In addition, a board
member for this facility/business confirmed that the facility acquires animals from different locations. The board member
stated that at least a portion of those animals are then transferred to a USDA licensed B Dealer for the purpose of being
re-sold and/or distributed. This facility is not exempt from licensing. No person/business shall operate as a dealer without
a valid USDA license to ensure there is proper oversite of all animals being used for regulated activity under the Animal
Welfare Act. Correct by discontinuing regulated activity until a USDA License can be obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
SHANNON SEBERA, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOR
Kendra Nicholas, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
This facility is currently conducting regulated activity without a USDA license.  Five (5) disposition forms confirmed the 
transfer of a total of 24 dogs and/or puppies from this facility/business to a USDA Licensed B Dealer.  In addition, a board 
member for this facility/business confirmed that the facility acquires animals from different locations.  The board member 
stated that at least a portion of those animals are then transferred to a USDA licensed B Dealer for the purpose of being 
re-sold and/or distributed.  This facility is not exempt from licensing. No person/business shall operate as a dealer without 
a valid USDA license to ensure there is proper oversite of all animals being used for regulated activity under the Animal 
Welfare Act.  Correct by discontinuing regulated activity until a USDA License can be obtained. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
SHANNON SEBERA, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOR 
Kendra Nicholas, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
